query:
SELECT t.id, t.title, COUNT(tc.id) as checklist_count
FROM tasks t
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON t.id = tc.taskId
GROUP BY t.id, t.title
ORDER BY t.id
LIMIT 10;

LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON t.id = tc.taskId
